description: This table stores information about provider communications. This includes whether the communication is sensitive or not, where the communication originated from, and the communication job ID.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: COMM_INFO_JOB_ID
columns.description: This item stores the job ID for the communication info table. Information stored in this table will stay the same for every recipient in one communication.

columns.name: COMM_FROM_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the communication from user's ID.

columns.name: COMM_SENSITIVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the sensitive setting of a communication.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sensitive


Not Sensitive


Marked Sensitive After Send


Marked Not Sensitive After Send

columns.name: COMM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of communication, used to define a specific workflow for the communication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMM_INFO_EXT_USR
columns.description: Communication from external user, a free text string.

columns.name: COMM_MSG_ID
columns.description: Universally unique ID for a communication.

columns.name: COMM_PARENT_ID
columns.description: Message ID of the parent communication

columns.name: COMM_CONV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the conversation, which is used to group related communications.

columns.name: COMM_FROM_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider (SER) record that sent the communication.
